entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:21 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 07:17 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: ENE 33 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
